trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> is in an invalid <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ThreadState*> for the method call.
trans-unit.target: Unntak forårsakes når en <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref> har et ugyldig <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ThreadState*>for metodekallet.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.ThreadState*>

trans-unit.source: Once a thread is created, it is in at least one of the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> states until it terminates.
trans-unit.target: Når en tråd er opprettet, er i minst én av de <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>angir til det avsluttes.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>

trans-unit.source: `ThreadStateException` is thrown by methods that cannot perform the requested operation due to the current state of a thread.
trans-unit.target: `ThreadStateException`forårsakes av metoder som ikke kan utføre den forespurte operasjonen på grunn av gjeldende status for en tråd.

trans-unit.source: For example, trying to restart an aborted thread by calling <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A> on a thread that has terminated throws a ThreadStateException.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel forsøk på å starte en avbrutt tråd ved å kalle <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>oppstår en ThreadStateException på en tråd som er avsluttet.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: ThreadStateException uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADSTATE, which has the value 0x80131520.
trans-unit.target: ThreadStateException bruker HRESULT COR_E_THREADSTATE, som har verdien 0x80131520.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ThreadStateException, see the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av ThreadStateException, kan du se den <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException.%23ctor%2A>konstruktører.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadStateException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadStateException"> </xref> klasse standardegenskapene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the `Message` property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The requested operation cannot be performed on the thread due to its current state."
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den `Message` for den nye forekomsten til en system-angitt melding som beskriver feilen, slik som "den forespurte operasjonen ikke kan utføres på tråd på grunn av den gjeldende tilstanden."

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen tar hensyn til gjeldende system kultur.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Lokaliserte feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadStateException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadStateException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the `Message` property of the new instance using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den `Message` for ny forekomst med den `message` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadStateException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadStateException"> </xref> klasse serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XML og SOAP-serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som inneholder den serialiserte objektdata om som oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadStateException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadStateException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne unntaket er årsaken til dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av et tidligere unntak må inkludere en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>returnerer samme verdi som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller `null` hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke internt unntak verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Referansen for det indre unntaket. | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `innerException` -parameteren er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.
